channel.title: Group 3's Favorite Movies
channel.description: Recent content on Group 3's Favorite Movies

item.title: Tim's Favorite Movies (from the top of his head)
TylerT's Favorite Movies (from the top of his head)
item.description: TylerT’s favorite movies The Dark Knight Rises (2012) Now You See Me (2013) Top Gun (1986) Tim’s comment: Now You See Me was a great movie! It had me on the edge of my seat at every encounter! Stephen’s comment: The Dark Knight is my personal favorite movie but I also love The Dark Knight Rises, especially the ending scene between Alfred and Bruce. Tyler D’s comment: I’ve heard so many great things about Now You See Me but haven’t watched it.

item.title: What has Gaby watched (from the top of her head)
item.description: Gaby’s recently watched movies/tv shows Puss in Boots: The Last Wish (2022) The Menu (2022) The Last of Us (2023) Thierry’s comment: The Last of Us is such a goated show! Pedro Pascal is a great actor! Tim’s comment: I’m glad you thought Puss in Boots was good. I heard many great things about it and am looking forward to seeing it! Stephen’s comment: The Last of Us is currently my favorite show on TV!

item.title: What has Stephen watched (from the top of his head)
item.description: Stephen’s favorite movies The Dark Knight (2008) Interstellar (2014) Parasite (2019) Thierry’s comment: You can’t go wrong with Parasite! The plot twist at the middle of the movie was insane! Gaby’s comment: I still need to watch Parasite! I’ve heard so many good things and was really excited that they won so many awards when it first came out! Tim’s comment: I agree with Thierry! I did not expect anything that happened in that movie.

item.title: Thierry's favorite movies (from the top of his head)
item.description: Thierry’s recently watched movies/tv shows The Pursuit of Happyness (2006) Everything Everywhere all at Once (2022) The Godfather (1972) Tim’s comment: You can’t go wrong with an original like The Godfather! Tyler D’s comment: Everthing Everywhere all at Once was such a trippy movie but everything connected at the end. I’m so glad that they got multiple awards at the Oscar!
